content: casablanca crochet quilt abbreviations beg - beginning chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch space - space double_crochet - double_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet blo - back loop only note this afghan is worked using worsted weight yarn in the colors specified with each project it is made up of two different types of granny squares a solid color granny and a bi-color granny general directions for each are as follows below simply crochet the number of squares needed for each block in the color required then assemble as described in instructions solid color granny finished square measures approximately 2 1/2 chain 4 join with a slip_stitch to first chain to form a ring round 1 chain 3 2 double_crochet in ring chain 1 3 double_crochet in ring chain 1 three times join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 round 2 chain 3 turn 2 double_crochet in first chain 1 space chain 1 3 double_crochet in same chain 1 space chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 1 in remaining 3 chain 1 sps join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 finish off weave in loose ends bi-color granny finished square measures approximately 2 1/2 chain 4 with main color join with a slip_stitch to first chain to form a ring round 1 chain 3 2 double_crochet in ring chain 1 3 double_crochet in ring drop main color but do not cut pickup second color yo draw through loop on hook 3 double_crochet in ring chain 1 3 double_crochet in ring chain 1 join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 round 2 turn slip_stitch in first chain 1 space chain 3 2 double_crochet in same chain 1 space chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet in next chain 1 space chain 1 3 double_crochet in next chain 1 space drop second color pick up main color again yo draw through loop on hook 3 double_crochet in same chain 1 space chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet in next chain 1 space chain 1 3 double_crochet in last chain 1 space chain 1 join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 finish off weave in loose ends casablanca crochet quilt approx finished size 70 x 87 materials needed 27 oz warm brown worsted weight yarn 65 oz black worsted weight yarn 43 oz buff worsted weight yarn size g crochet hook or size needed for gauge tapestry needle afghan assembly using tapestry needle and appropriate color yarn and stitching thru blo assemble the blocks using the diagram below for placement border round 1 with black yarn join with a slip_stitch to any corner chain 1 space single_crochet around work 3 single_crochet in each corner chain 1 space join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet to join round 2 chain 3 turn double_crochet in each single_crochet around work 3 double_crochet in each corner join with a slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 to join round 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each
